author: robervalwalsh
body:
This request is to include new files, as well as modifications to existing files, needed for the simulation of the BRIL BCM1F detector.
Thanks.
Roberval
A presentation in the simulation meeting at
https://indico.cern.ch/event/254362/session/2/contribution/12/material/slides/0.pdf
title: Simulation of BCM1F
